body:
Hello

This is very late, I know. 

Post any bugs that are in tournament maps here and myself and other MapDevs will most likely fix them.

Regards

title: Tournament Map Fixes

replies.body: loads of people's is for some reason
replies.body_tagged: loads of people's is for some reason

replies.body: did u fix you being able to place blocks underneath and on the side of sunbeam?
replies.body_tagged: did u fix you being able to place blocks underneath and on the side of sunbeam?

replies.body:
I told a few to Pel.

The leaf blocks that are part of the boundary on the left and right side of Hyrodrin. Doesn't affect much tho.

Have an unbreakable block under Hydrodrin spawn tube.

The rest I told Pel have been fixed, unless the mistakes on Sunbeam are still not fixed.

replies.body:
if not fixed:

supply room on sand ocean, aswell as leaves hanging out on the sides
You can build around walls at certain spots on sunbeam ctw
Supply room on that hydriononiraopni¨p map, more glass and logs.
Winter's land shouldnt drop snowballs when mined a snow block. Maybe edit the supply room, i dont mind either.

replies.body: I hate it when you are about to cross a boundary that you are not supposed to go to and the YML restricts you to pass, it just glitches you there and there's no way you can get out of it, unless someone comes and kill you.
